name: Dice Kapital TTRPG Micro-Grant Scheme
description:
Dice Kapital is giving grants of £2500 to three tabletop role playing game projects! If you have a great TTRPG project in mind but don't have the time or funds to make it a reality, this is for you!

This grant opened for applications on the 13th of May and closes on the 15th of July. Successful applicants will be notified on the 29th of July.

This grant is internationally available. We encourage creatives outside  of Europe and the United States to apply!

The application itself is not available on itch. This page provides:

  • A guidance document containing information and advice for the grant scheme.
  • A blank Word version of the grant application in which you can draft your answers should you choose to apply.

You can fill in and submit your application form for the grant on this Google form: https://forms.gle/kgfcXWwk234UVnwf6 

If you have any questions, please read through the guidance first. If you still have questions, please contact the email address contained in the guidance form. Questions about the grant scheme posted in the comments will not be answered.
